name: Dreamland (itch) (Nicholas.Papadoulakis)
description: Nightmaro stole Dreama's dream wand and he plans to cause continuous nightmares worldwide!!!!!! As a consequence, people will suffer from severe insomnia !!!! It's up to Mr Dream to eliminate Nightmaro and find the wand of dreams so Dreama can balance people's dreams again. #platformer #fantasy #dream #dreams #dreaming #dreamland
